name: A Spider, A Beetle, A Fly
name_original: A Spider, A Beetle, A Fly
description:
Created for Brackey's GameJam 2021.1, themed "Stronger Together," A Spider, A Beetle, A Fly is a puzzle game where you have to solve puzzles using the unique abilities of the three title characters.

(If you have issues with the WebGL version, check out the x86 download for windows.  Just unzip and run SBF.exe.)
